Package edu.baylor.flarn.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.flarn.controllers.UserController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/users")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserController class defines REST endpoints for User model.
